name: Wiz
description: This plugin is used to fetch applications from the Wiz platform. This plugin does not support sharing applications or pushing applications to Wiz.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL for Wiz platform. e.g. https://api.<region>.app.wiz.io

configuration.label: Token URL
configuration.description: Token URL for Wiz platform to generate the auth token. e.g. https://auth.app.wiz.io
